name: Spawn (itch)
description:
You are a SPAWN SHAMAN attempting to transcend the levels of consciousness!  You will taste exotic fruits and meet mischievous spirits on your way!

LEFT-CLICK to activate a fruit. CURSOR-KEYS to navigate.

More SPAWNS on screen will increase your MULTIPLIER.

As your SPAWN POWER increases, so does your navigation speed. When your SPAWN POWER resets, your navigation speed is slow.

Use your HOME SPAWNS to begin the spawning process.
